attributes.action: Open up wasteland for new allotments
attributes.additional_details: building can not take place this land could be used to create more allotments and improve people's lives with many health benefits...so im asking the government to work with local councils and create something positive
attributes.background: As an allotment tenant im witness to how the space and fresh air can improve your mental health unfortunately allotments are limited and waiting lists can be upwards of five years plus yet there is loads of land going waste that standard

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public (paper) petition about this.

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP
